name: SheepMotion
description:
Intro text:

The sheeps are chillin' on the farm. Time for some tasty grass on the fields. It's your job to be a dog and guide those fluffy wool balls to the field. But look out, darkness is falling. So better get your sheep back to the farm before the sun goes down.
The more sheep you have, the harder it gets.

How to play:
Guid the sheep to the field and back to the farm.
You control the 2 dogs with the left and right mouse button

Thanks to the contributors:

Niels Meyering
Erik Wittkorn
Myungjee Jung
Tobias Oberbeck
Sergey Krutikov

Background Music: "Hammock Fight" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
Using Sound Effects from https://freesound.org
